values.headline: Computer scientist and software engineer
values.summary:
Computer systems researcher, software engineer, and project manager with 10 patents granted and 3 pending in color scanning, embedded data in images, robotics, sensor networks, artificial intelligence, and video search. Open source & Linux advocate and developer. For 32 years worked at the forefront of innovation in software and hardware systems, user interface design, and new media at cutting edge labs such as Northrop Advanced Systems, Schlumerger, Sun Labs, AT&T Labs, Interval Research Corporation, and Xerox PARC. At Sun served on the Digital Rights Management Task Force and the Open Source Licensing Committee, working on intellectual property issues combined with new technologies for distribution, and filed 6 patents on wireless sensor networks. At Interval Research developed Virtual Reality content, patented robotic user interface techniques, and developed and patented a digital video search method. At Xerox PARC patented an amorphous-silicon color scanner design, and was the principle inventor of the Xerox “Glyph” embedded data in images technology, with 3 patents. At Art Center College of Design and California College of the Arts lectured and advised graduate media students. At Montavista Software developed embedded Linux software and software tools for embedded Linux. At Liquid Robotics, did Linux camera integration on a wave and solar powered autonomous ocean going robotics platform with satellite communication. Recently a member of Texas Instrument's Android Development Team in Sunnyvale, California.

Specialties: Researcher, programmer, engineer, project manager, technology strategist, writer, scientist, inventor, user interface, Linux, Android, wireless sensor networks, open source, mobility.

I have 18 years of consulting and software development experience.  I specialize in business process analysis, software selection and implementation, and data conversion, typically in process improvement projects for either single departments or small companies. 
  
I am currently working with School Loop to integrate data from School District sites to a student tracking system. values.headline: Founder at TICKERLICK

values.summary:
Conceptualized, designed and developed a technical signal generator system to assist traders to find buy/sell signals for stocks traded in major US exchanges. The signals are generated by using live and historical prices. Used  MACD (moving average convergence/divergence) (12,26,9) and MACD(5,35,5) technical analysis indicatorS to generate signals.

Key Achievements:
* Developed fully in LAMP environment.
* Developed web crawlers to retrieve live market data and historical stock price data.
* Designed and developed user interface screens (Written in PERL/CGI, HTML)
* Designed a MySQL database and tables. Wrote SQL queries to store and retrieve data from database.
* Configured Apache, MySQL and MOD_PERL in a Linux server.
Environment: Linux, PERL, MOD_PERL, MySQL, CGI, Dreamweaver and Apache
values.title: Founder

values.summary:
Objective

Seeking a challenging position as a Programmer/Web Developer with  strong background of working knowledge of Perl and database along with the experience and skills to work in scheduled deadlines and under pressure. Strong organizational and management skills with excellent verbal, written communication and interpersonal skills.

Qualification Profile

* Solutions-oriented programmer with a track record of effective software and Internet development demonstrated through 17+ years’ experience designing applications in a broad variety of industries.
* Proven success in an engineering development and support environment, working with software applications, Internet development, and database processes.
* 2+ years of technical Lead experience mentoring teams globally and across multiple departments.
 * Strong background in processing, aggregating and distributing financial data feeds from leading market data vendors.
* Strong background in designing and developing web crawlers and search engines, large-scale content extraction and transformation systems.
* Experience in Advanced Perl programming, LAMP Stack.
* Proficient in gathering and translating technical requirements, allowing efficient and accurate development.
 * Strong background in collaborating between customers and engineering functions in a consulting and corporate environment.
* Agile/waterfall development methodology experience.


Core Competencies

* Web Applications Development
* Database and Data Warehouse Applications
* Financial Market data systems
* Search Engines
* E-Commerce Applications
* Security System Implementation
* Technical Training

Technical Background

Platforms/Tools/Technologies: Unix, Linux, PERL, CGI, HTML, XML, Shell Scripting, Oracle, MySQL, Sybase, Dreamweaver, Apache, Web Logic, MOD_PERL, AJAX, Ant, CVS, Bugzilla and Autosys

values.summary:
Project Title              :  Virtual Event Manager.
Client                         :  ON24.Inc. San Francisco CA USA. Website-www.on24.com
 Role                           :  As a Quality Assurance Engineer.        
 Technologies           :  Java, J2EE, flex.
 Testing                      :  Manual Process, with Bug Tracking tool Jira.
Description               : Fully customizable virtual shows
ON24 Virtual Show a cost-efficient virtual events for applications ranging from demand generation and corporate communications to training and continuing education initiatives. ON24 Virtual Show is a virtual venue for events such as trade shows, partner pavilions, conferences and training summits. More engaging and interactive:ON24 Virtual Show provides a suite of interactive networking tools, including group and individual chat, scheduled discussions, message boards, vCard exchange, a message center and Q&A tools, which makes it easy for attendees to connect with sponsors, exhibitors and other attendees. Without ever leaving their desks, ON24 Virtual Show participants can, for example, learn from video presentations, interact with exhibitors and communicate with peers using professional networking tools. This level of interaction builds and strengthens relationships with prospects and customers. With its complete registration system and ability to track attendee activity, ON24 Virtual Show delivers robust reporting analytics
